content: Hello, i'd like some Zulip emojis added, with the text Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat, Sun on them. Can i just create those images and ask someone to add them for me?
I think we could do that (unless anyone else objects?).
yeah seems fine, though maybe good to consider upstreaming if possible
Upstream only do standard emoji as far as I'm aware - there's a "custom emoji" feature in the organization settings for our own (e.g. Rust logos and things like that).

https://gist.github.com/crlf0710/87109447cb09d433d61a25cd37f893eb
I've uploaded them to the gist
these won't show up well on the dark theme for Zulip, could you add a background to them?
Oh sure! I'm sorry, i will update them.
Updated the gist and added white background to the images.
Does the custom emoji support allow having different versions for light and dark themes?
That would be a nice feature for upstream Zulip.
